General.Name: Guangdong High Dream Intellectualized Machinery Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Guangdong High Dream Intellectualized Machinery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells weighing machineries in China and internationally. It provides multihead weighers, loss-in weight feeders, metal detectors, and check weighers. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Foshan, China.

1.Name: Mr. Jinrong  Lin
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang., Financial Director and Sec.

2.Name: Mr. Jun  Liang
2.Title: Technical Director, Devel. Chief Engineer and Director
